data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Zarqa to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zarqa, Jordan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Zarqa, Jordan that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Zarqa.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Zarqa.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Zarqa.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 890,061 lost people in  Zarqa, Jordan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Zarqa, Jordan has a population of 910,800.

We estimate Zarqa has 2,423 people who might know Jesus, 18,316 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 890,061 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 375 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 2,423 believers in Zarqa, Jordan a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
